A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can only assume the director either never saw the previous films or just hated the series. This was a plot hole laden mess. The treatment of Lukes character was deplorable. Ray and Kylo are two of the most uninteresting characters ever. She seemly becomes all powerful without any work. Kylo isn't threatening\, hes just a petulant child. I don't think I'll bother going to the cinema for episode 9 after this.
